articles.description: Reaction as Liverpool and West Ham exit the Europa League at the quarter-final stage, while Aston Villa  move into the semi-finals of the Europa Conference League.
articles.title: Liverpool and West Ham out of Europe, but Villa through - reaction

articles.description: Lando Norris beats Lewis Hamilton and Fernando Alonso to take pole position for the sprint race at the Chinese Grand Prix in a hectic wet session.
articles.title: Chinese Grand Prix 2024: Lando Norris on sprint pole ahead of Lewis Hamilton

articles.description: The Football Association defends its decision to scrap FA Cup replays from 2024-25 and says "all parties accepted" they could not continue.
articles.title: 'All parties accepted' replays should stop - FA

articles.description: Two weeks ago, Liverpool were top of the Premier League and had a favourable route to the Europa League final - things now look very different for Jurgen Klopp's side as his departure looms.
articles.title: Liverpool 'playing under stress' but should not 'mope around'

articles.description: West Ham boss David Moyes is involved in a frosty exchange with a reporter after being asked about his future after their Europa League exit.
articles.title: 'Sorry, I didn't get that question' - Moyes frosty with reporter

articles.description: BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton takes on singer and Arsenal fan Sam Tompkins to make predictions for this weekend's FA Cup semi-final ties and Premier League games.
articles.title: Sutton's FA Cup & Premier League predictions v singer Sam Tompkins

articles.description: Roma progress to the Europa League semi-finals by beating Serie A rivals AC Milan at Stadio Olimpico.
articles.title: Roma see off AC Milan to reach Europa League semis

articles.description: Head coach John Mitchell wants his England side to continue playing "on the edge" as they close in on a sixth successive Women's Six Nations title.
articles.title: Playing at the 'edge' key to England's title charge

articles.description: Follow live text updates and BBC radio commentary from day one of the third round of the 2024 County Championship.
articles.title: County Championship LIVE: Score, commentary & updates from day one of the third round

articles.description: Germany manager Julian Nagelsmann signs a contract extension to run until after the 2026 World Cup.
articles.title: Nagelsmann extends Germany contract until 2026
